mapper.select:
/*videoDao.videoList.박혁진*/ SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, a.* FROM (SELECT v.video_idx, CASE WHEN lengthb(v.video_title) > 100 THEN SUBSTR(v.video_title, 0, 38) || '...' ELSE v.video_title END video_title, v.video_contents, v.video_identified_id, v.video_regdate, v.video_wrtdate, v.video_uptdate, v.video_reg_id, v.video_reg_ip, v.video_upt_ip, v.video_view_cnt, m.member_channel_name, m.member_img FROM VIDEO_PHJ v, MEMBER_PHJ m WHERE 1=1 AND v.video_reg_id = m.member_id(+) ORDER BY video_idx DESC ) a)
WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{criteria.page} - 1) * #{criteria.perPageNum} + 1 AND #{criteria.page} * #{criteria.perPageNum}
/*videoDao.videoListCnt.박혁진*/ SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT video_idx) FROM VIDEO_PHJ WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: /*videoDao.registerVideo.박혁진*/ INSERT INTO VIDEO_PHJ( video_idx, video_title, video_contents, video_identified_id, video_regdate, video_wrtdate, video_reg_id, video_reg_ip ) VALUES( VIDEO_PHJ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{videoTitle}, #{videoContents}, #{videoIdentifiedId}, sysdate, sysdate, #{videoRegId}, #{videoRegIp} )
mapper.select: /*videoDao.videoDetail.박혁진*/ SELECT v.video_idx, v.video_title, v.video_contents, v.video_identified_id, v.video_regdate, v.video_wrtdate, v.video_uptdate, v.video_reg_id, v.video_reg_ip, v.video_upt_ip, v.video_view_cnt, m.member_channel_name, m.member_img FROM VIDEO_PHJ v, MEMBER_PHJ m WHERE 1=1 AND v.video_reg_id = m.member_id(+) AND VIDEO_IDX = #{videoIdx}
